picks.reasoning: Both teams trending heavily under (10 of Cavs' last 14, 4 of Bulls' last 5). Cavs missing Mobley, Strus, Nance. Low-energy matchup between struggling squads.
Anthony Edwards OUT, Ja Morant doubtful. Both stars absent means sloppy, defensive game. Under hit 9 of 13 Grizz road games, 8 of 5 Wolves home games.
Xavier 5-game win streak, 7-1 ATS in December, elite at home. Creighton 3-8 ATS last 11, 0-5 vs quality opponents. Big East opener favors hot home team.
Spread too large (22.5+). Florida 3-7 ATS this season. Big spreads against overmatched opponents rarely cover cleanly.

26.5-point spread too large. Big spreads are dangerous even when talent gap is massive. Longwood 0-8 ATS but spread too risky to back either side.
